q: the unsuccessful Democratic nominee last year for Evan Bayh 's Senate seat. Mike McDaniel said that while he was state GOP chairman-- from 1995 until 2002-- Mike Pence mentioned the governor's office to him. He told me then that he thought he could accomplish more for the people of Indiana as governor than he could in Congress, he said. "This has been on his mind for a long time." Simon Cowell said allowing the crowd to react in real time will help him avoid overlooking another big star. There have been many, many times on these shows where I've hated somebody and practically had a mutiny going on behind me, he said. On Friday, Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne hinted about the automaker's commercial: I won't tell you what it's about, but it will be worth watching. Sergio Marchionne , who spoke at a San Francisco event associated with the National Automobile Dealers Association's annual convention, said Chrysler spent less than$ 9 million on the ad. Gerald Ford , who produces the show with his wife Michelle King , said he wanted Donald Rumsfeld to appear as a witness in a lawsuit, testifying about why aggressive interrogation techniques like water-boarding are sometimes needed during wartime. It's an episode about moral relativism about what is considered torture and what is not, Robert Gerald Ford said. Simon Cowell has made no secret of the fact that he was underwhelmed by what Dublin had to offer- and it is believed to be under his orders that X Factor has axed the Irish leg. defenses have their work cut out for them trying to get to those guys," said John Kuhn , a running back who broke into the NFL taking handoffs from Ben Roethlisberger , but now plays behind Aaron Rodgers . When defenses get to them, it's not over. They've got to get them to the ground. Against Atlanta, Aaron Rodgers made like four or five guys miss in the pocket on several different plays. He's phenomenal. He's playing at a high level right now. But with Ben Roethlisberger , you can't tackle him. He's a beast back there. I think people underestimate how big and strong he actually is. The 6-foot-2, 225-pound Aaron Rodgers ran for 23.8 yards per game this season, the most among all quarterbacks other than Michael Vick . "A growing number of MSPs have embraced the Google Apps Reseller program," says an MSPmentor says Eric Schmidt 's Google has gained more channel partner momentum with managed services providers. Indeed, 29 of the world's top 100 MSPs now promote Google Apps to their end-customers. The article asks, "Will that trend continue when the CEO crown soon shifts from Eric Schmidt to Google co-founder Larry Page?"
